news.title: Drake and PartyNextDoor Announce Summer 2025 Tour
news.summary: The $ome $exy $ongs 4 U collaborators will play shows in the United Kingdom and Europe

news.title: Pusha T Says Dispute Over Kendrick Lamar Verse Led to Expensive Def Jam Exit
news.summary: The rapper claims that the label, which is owned by Universal Music Group, was reluctant to release a song with two of Drake’s biggest adversaries

news.title: Grizzly Bear Add More Dates to First Tour Since 2019
news.summary: Due to high demand, the band has added shows in Brooklyn and Chicago

news.title: Japanese Composer Yasunao Tone Dies at 90
news.summary: The influential glitch musician and multimedia artist helped spearhead the Japanese Fluxus movement

news.title: Sudan Archives Shares Video for New Song “Dead”: Watch
news.summary: It’s her first new music in nearly three years, following the standout 2022 album Natural Brown Prom Queen

news.title: Cate Le Bon Announces New Album and Tour, Shares Video for New Song “Heaven Is No Feeling”: Watch
news.summary: Michelangelo Dying is out in September, via Mexican Summer, and features a collaboration with John Cale

news.title: Big Thief Announce New Album Double Infinity, Share New Song “Incomprehensible”: Listen
news.summary: The follow-up to 2022’s Dragon New Warm Mountain I Believe In You is out September 5

news.title: Lil Wayne Announces Tour for New Album Tha Carter VI
news.summary: The rapper will celebrate all of his Carter albums on his trek across North America

news.title: Shame Announce New Album, Share Video for New Song “Cutthroat”: Watch
news.summary: The English post-punk band will also embark on a tour behind the new LP

news.title: Wednesday Announce Fall 2025 Tour
news.summary: The indie-rock band will hit the road with support from Friendship and Daffo
